comment:
>>38008649

They're fast, and neither one is conceding an inch. The two of them are weaving abilities into their styles. You see the woman activate Haste, and she's occasionally bearing down on his dodges with an almost imperceptibly fast strike; the other is more fluid in his movements, taking slower and more deliberate sword swings that leave crackling green scars in the air adjacent.

"She's Crimson!" Donnel shouts.

"Mm? ...Reinforcements?" The man somersaults backwards at a moment's notice, disengaging from combat. He holds the Guardian at length with his sword, then begins channeling energy as if he's casting a spell.

"What?" The Guardian looks between your group and him, evidently thrown off. "Who are you?"

She charges, unafraid, moving into range with an upward swing of her spear--that just doesn't seem to connect. Another swing of his sword barely seems to catch her, but sends a wave of crackling energy dancing across her armor, and she stumbles backards, stunned.

What will you do?
> Keep watching.
> Tackle him.
> Try to attack him from length with your sword.
> Other.
name: BSO
